name: Vault Assault: Tournament Edition
description:
This is an altered version of the game Vault Assault that was released at the Philly Classic 3. The game is the same as Vault Assault with the following exceptions:
  • The difficulty switches are not used
  • There is no Easter egg or special message
  • On level 9, the difficulty increases, the longer you play, until it gets so hard you can't continue. The goal is then to score as many points as you can until you lose your last life.
